ticket.title: Why does ActionController::MimeResponds have :nodoc:?
ticket.original-body:
action_controller/metal/mime_responds.rb has
module ActionController #:nodoc: module MimeResponds #:nodoc:
I'm guessing :nodoc: is used for methods that tend to only be used internally, but MimeResponds has user-facing instance methods like `respond_to` or `respond_with`, which are now missing from api.rubyonrails.org.
Should the :nodoc: be removed? (I'm not sure enough to just submit a patch...)
